```{r load packages, message = FALSE}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
neighborhoods <- st_read("BOUNDARY_CDDNeighborhoods.shp")
streetlights <- st_read("INFRA_StreetLights.shp")
openspace <- st_read("RECREATION_OpenSpace.shp")
```

```{r}
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = neighborhoods, color = "black",
          size = 0.5,
          fill = "orange",
          alpha = 0.1)+
  geom_sf(data = openspace, color = NA,
          size = NA,
          fill = "green",
          alpha = 0.75) +
  geom_sf(data = streetlights, color = "yellow",
          shape = 17,
          size = 0.5,
          alpha = NA)
```
